name: FOGO (MADE BY FOGO TEAM 6 people)
description:
TEAM FOGO Noah MacDonald: Gabriel Bulcao Rachman: Jeremy Selwyn: Maria Starostina: Christopher Bradshaw: https://braaadshaw.itch.io/ Tristan Durocher: Dawson College

A Platforming game created for the alpha milestone of the final project of the the Independent Video Game Design program at Dawson College (https://www.dawsoncollege.qc.ca/aec/programs/independent-video-game-design/) If you are in Montreal, check it out!

description

the game description

controls

** This game requires an controller (Recommended xbox)

Movement (Swimming) :

Left stick

Movement (Flinging): 

1. Hold Right Trigger

2. Aim Left Stick like rubber band

3. Release Right Trigger while holding Left Stick in desired direction. 

Confirm: A

Pause: Start

Restart Checkpoint: (F on Keyboard or Select)

If you have any suggestions / feedback / bugs please let us know!  Thank you for playing Fogo!

The Fogo Team
